buildings.descriptions.sauna: A modest steam room that kick-starts your heat production.
buildings.flavour.sauna: Neighbours trade gossip between bursts of steam.
buildings.descriptions.kylakauppa: Expands local commerce so villagers can stock up on löyly essentials.
buildings.flavour.kylakauppa: The clerk always knows who visited the sauna last night.
buildings.descriptions.alko: Distributes spirits that keep loyal throwers energised.
buildings.flavour.alko: Deliveries arrive just in time for the evening steam rush.
buildings.descriptions.ensiapu: Keeps first aid close at hand so mishaps never slow production.
buildings.flavour.ensiapu: The medic stores towels, bandages, and sauna wisdom in every pocket.
buildings.descriptions.baari: A lively bar that boosts morale and spending in equal measure.
buildings.flavour.baari: Old heroes retell their greatest steam streaks over foamy drinks.
buildings.descriptions.cittari: A hypermarket shifting crates of firewood and vihtas around the clock.
buildings.flavour.cittari: Shoppers leave with enough supplies for half the countryside.
buildings.descriptions.sateri: Private estates whose patrons fund premium stove upgrades.
buildings.flavour.sateri: Their marble benches never cool, even at dawn.
buildings.descriptions.kasino: A glittering casino attracting investors with deep pockets.
buildings.flavour.kasino: The roulette wheel glows like an ember when someone wins.
buildings.descriptions.kirkko: Consecrated halls that transform faith into pure löyly funding.
buildings.flavour.kirkko: The choir hums in perfect sync with the stove.
buildings.descriptions.vankila: Strict routines that convert idle time into regimented heat output.
buildings.flavour.vankila: Guards trade sauna schedules like prized contraband.
buildings.descriptions.bordelli: An infamous attraction drawing guests who pay generously for warmth.
buildings.flavour.bordelli: Velvet curtains hide laughter louder than the stove.
buildings.descriptions.kampus: A research campus uncovering breakthroughs in thermal science.
buildings.flavour.kampus: Students compete to patent the next legendary heater.
buildings.descriptions.tehdas: An industrial complex automating resource flows for colossal output.
buildings.flavour.tehdas: Conveyor belts shimmer with sparks that never burn out.
buildings.descriptions.parlamenttitalo: Government backing that secures budgets for monumental heaters.
buildings.flavour.parlamenttitalo: Policy debates end only when the sauna reaches consensus.
buildings.descriptions.placeholder: Debug construction used for testing production pipelines.
buildings.flavour.placeholder: If you see this, someone forgot to hide the scaffolding.
tech.title: Teknologiat
tech.descriptions.vihta: Traditional birch whisk that invigorates every throw.
tech.flavour.vihta: Leaves flutter like applause with each swing.
tech.descriptions.kalja: Chilled beer that keeps sauna crews relaxed and productive.
tech.flavour.kalja: Foam moustaches have become the unofficial uniform.
tech.descriptions.kossu: A stronger tonic that raises courage and production multipliers.
tech.flavour.kossu: One sip and the embers crackle in rhythm.
tech.descriptions.kiulu_ja_kauha: Precision bucket and ladle combo for rapid, accurate throws.
tech.flavour.kiulu_ja_kauha: Carved from heartwood that never splinters under pressure.
tech.descriptions.saunalakki: Insulated hat that lets masters endure blistering sessions.
tech.flavour.saunalakki: The tassel always points toward the hottest bench.
tech.descriptions.lampomittari: Precision thermometer guiding optimal heat management.
tech.flavour.lampomittari: Mercury dances like northern lights inside the glass.
tech.descriptions.burana: Painkillers that keep teams operating through marathon throws.
tech.flavour.burana: Empty packs hang like a hard-earned banner in the locker.
tech.descriptions.saunatuoksu: Aromatic infusions that lift morale and encourage premium spending.
tech.flavour.saunatuoksu: One drop can summon memories of midsummer forests.
tech.descriptions.saunaklonkku: A mischievous goblin squeezing extra heat from every corner.
tech.flavour.saunaklonkku: You hear giggling whenever production spikes unexpectedly.
tech.descriptions.uraanikivet: Exotic uranium stones radiating relentless warmth.
tech.flavour.uraanikivet: They hum softly, resonating through the benches.
tech.descriptions.kamehameha: Legendary technique unleashing devastating waves of steam.
tech.flavour.kamehameha: Rumour says it was mastered by shouting into the void for days.
tech.descriptions.hawkingin_loylygeneraa: Cutting-edge generator bending physics to multiply löyly output.
tech.flavour.hawkingin_loylygeneraattori: Equations float in the air like steam whenever it activates.

maailma.upgrades.ikuiset_hiillokset.name: Ikuiset hiillokset
maailma.upgrades.feeniks_sauna.name: Feeniks-sauna
maailma.upgrades.feeniks_sauna.descripti: Jokainen Polta sauna alkaa vähintään ×2 peruskertoimella.
maailma.upgrades.maailmankivi.name: Maailmankivi
maailma.upgrades.maailmankivi.descriptio: Avaa seuraava taso yhden tason aiemmin (–1 tier unlock).
maailma.upgrades.tyhjyys_tehokkuus.name: Tyhjyyden tehokkuus
maailma.upgrades.tuhkan_infuusio.name: Tuhkan infuusio
maailma.upgrades.tuhkan_infuusio.descrip: Jokaisesta avatuista tasoista yli T7 pysyvä +1% globaali CPS per taso.
maailma.upgrades.alkulampo.name: Alkulämpö
maailma.upgrades.kuolematon_saunan_henki: Teknologiat eivät nollaudu Polta saunassa (tai niistä saa välittömän hyvityksen).
maailma.upgrades.tuhkan_riimu.name: Tuhkan riimu
maailma.upgrades.tuhkan_riimu.descriptio: Jokainen käytetty Tuhka antaa +0.05% pysyvän globaalin CPS-bonuksen (kertyy).
maailma.description: Kirjoita ”{phrase}” vahvistaaksesi. Tämä nollaa nykyisen maailman ja alkaa uudelta aikakaudelta.
maailma.modal.label: Vahvista polttamalla maailma
maailma.toast.none: Maailma paloi, mutta et ansainnut uutta Tuhkaa.
